dmca.title: Reseller Shot Down
dmca.body:
Dear [Private]:

Our firm represents Guntersville Breathables, Inc. in various intellectual property matters, including protection of its trademark rights and associated litigation.  As you may know, our client is the owner of various U.S. trademark registrations, including the Registration No. 2043826 for the mark FROGGTOGGS and Application No. 76565906 for the mark, CHILLY PAD.

We understand that you are currently the owner of the domain names www.chillypad.com, www.chillipad.com, www.chilipad.com, www.chilypad.com and www.frogtoggs.com, which websites link to your online store in which our client
